overview: What happens when your greatest fears, the fears that have shaped you, come back to hunt you down and destroy you? The story of a getaway gone bad, where the perpetrators and their hostages find themselves mysteriously trapped on a deserted highway. There's something in the woods around them and it's taking them down one by one
tagline: What if there was a place ... a place where reason did not exist and impossibility did. A place where you doubted nearly everything you knew and felt. Everything but fear.
title: Isolated
